headline: Ford Motor Stock Lures Investors With 7.5% Dividend Yield
summary: Shares of beleaguered automaker Ford Motor (F) have slumped 15.3% over the past year, trailing the S&P 500’s (SPX) gain of 10% over the same period. The company has dealt with a glut of challenges during this time—customers are feeling the pinch of inflation and sustain less confidence in the economy, which hampers appetites for big-ticket purchases like automobiles. Despite the price slide, I remain bullish on F stock and see more value at lower levels. Plus, there is plenty of uncertainty surr

summary: The rout in Tesla's stock is even shaking the most biggest of bulls.

headline: Is Ford Stock a Buy Now?
summary: The same can't be said of all stocks, particularly Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F).  It's worthwhile to understand the bull and bear cases before making a decision about Ford.  Ford is a consistently profitable enterprise.

headline: Ford: Tariffs And EV Losses - A Likely Road To Decline
summary: Ford faces potential declines in special dividends and free cash flow. See why F stock could be pressured by Model E losses and tariff impacts moving forward.

headline: This Week In Electric Vehicles - Xcel Energy Advances Renewable Energy with Virtual Power Plant
summary: Xcel Energy, in partnership with Itron, Inc. and Tesla, is set to deploy an advanced virtual power plant (VPP) in Colorado. The initiative integrates Itron’s IntelliFLEX Aggregator Distributed Energy Resource Management System (DERMS) and Tesla home batteries to enhance grid management, flexibility, and control. This collaboration is part of Xcel Energy's Renewable Battery Connect program, utilizing distributed energy resources (DERs) like residential battery storage and solar panels to...

headline: From Ford to Musk, the Perils of Trying to Build a Global Auto Empire
summary: Tesla’s reputational troubles and Stellantis’s falling sales are the latest examples of the obstacles facing transnational auto manufacturers.
